text: Hans Gilgen (16 September 1906 - 20 September 1980) was a Swiss racing cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. He was also the Swiss National Road Race champion in 1934. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1906 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People from Bern-Mittelland District Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Switzerland Category:Cyclists at the 1928 Summer Olympics
title: Hans Gilgen
